# Reflection on the Use of GenAI

## GenAI Tool Used
The primary GenAI tool I used for this assessment was **ChatGPT**.

![](imgs/chatgpt.png){width=100%}

## Why I Chose This Tool
I chose ChatGPT because it:
- Helps structure content clearly
- Explains technical steps in a simple manner
- Assists in improving writing quality and formatting

## How GenAI Helped Me
ChatGPT supported me in:
- Understanding how to configure Quarto and GitHub Pages
- Structuring my website content logically
- Improving clarity and flow in my written explanations

For example, it helped break down complex setup steps into clear, actionable instructions.

## Benefits
- Saves time when organizing ideas
- Helps refine existing content instead of rewriting from scratch
- Useful as a learning companion when stuck

## Challenges
- Requires careful checking to ensure correctness
- Over-reliance may reduce independent problem-solving if not used wisely

## Future Use
I believe GenAI tools will continue to assist me in:
- Debugging code
- Drafting reports
- Brainstorming project ideas
- Supporting learning in technical modules

Overall, GenAI is a valuable tool when used responsibly to enhance productivity and understanding.
